job_posting.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - AI Platform Architecture
job_posting.description:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer - AI Platform Architecture

TechStart | FinTech Scale-up | San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)

About TechStart

TechStart is a rapidly growing FinTech scale-up revolutionizing financial services through cutting-edge AI technology. With 150 passionate employees, we're building the future of intelligent financial systems that serve millions of users globally. Our mission is to democratize access to sophisticated financial tools through innovative machine learning solutions.

The Opportunity

We're seeking an exceptional Senior Machine Learning Engineer to lead the development of our next-generation AI platform architecture. This role combines cutting-edge research in artificial intelligence with practical implementation of scalable machine learning systems. You'll be instrumental in designing advanced ML algorithms, building robust data pipelines, and creating innovative solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible in AI-powered financial technology.

Your Impact

As a Senior ML Engineer, you'll join our AI Research and Development Division—a dynamic team of 45 world-class machine learning engineers, research scientists, and data architects. Our team has published over 150 papers in top-tier conferences, holds 80+ patents, and has been recognized with multiple industry awards for innovation.

Key Responsibilities

• Design and implement scalable machine learning architectures capable of handling petabyte-scale datasets with sub-second inference times

• Lead research initiatives in advanced AI domains including large language models, multimodal learning, and federated machine learning systems

• Develop and optimize deep learning models using PyTorch, TensorFlow, and JAX frameworks for production deployment

• Architect and maintain MLOps pipelines using Kubernetes, Docker, Apache Airflow, and MLflow for automated model training and deployment

• Collaborate with product teams to translate complex AI research into practical applications that enhance user experience

• Mentor junior engineers through code reviews, pair programming sessions, and technical guidance

• Conduct performance analysis and optimization of ML models for latency reduction and computational efficiency

• Establish best practices for model governance, bias detection, and responsible AI implementation

• Design A/B testing frameworks and analyze experimental results to drive data-driven decisions

• Stay current with latest ML research and implement cutting-edge techniques in production systems

What We're Looking For

Required Qualifications

• Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Statistics, or related quantitative field

• 7+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning engineering with proven track record of deploying ML systems at scale

• Expert-level proficiency in Python and ML libraries (PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn, NumPy, Pandas)

• Deep understanding of ML algorithms including deep neural networks, transformer architectures, and ensemble methods

• Production experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and distributed computing frameworks

• Strong software engineering practices including version control, CI/CD pipelines, and documentation

• Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) and microservices architecture

• Proficiency in SQL and NoSQL databases for large-scale data management

• Strong mathematical foundation in linear algebra, calculus, probability theory, and statistical inference

Preferred Qualifications

• PhD with dissertation research in machine learning, deep learning, or artificial intelligence

• Published papers in top-tier conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, AAAI)

• Experience leading teams of 3-8 engineers with technical mentorship

• AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialty or equivalent cloud certifications

• Background in financial technology or quantitative finance applications

• Open-source contributions to major ML frameworks

What We Offer

Compensation Package

• Base salary: $180,000 - $280,000 (commensurate with experience)

• Equity compensation: 0.15% - 0.35% stock options with 4-year vesting

• Annual performance bonus: 15-25% of base salary

• Total compensation potential exceeding $350,000 for top performers

Comprehensive Benefits

• 100% premium coverage for health, dental, and vision insurance (80% for dependents)

• Unlimited PTO with mandatory minimum 3 weeks off annually

• $8,000 annual professional development budget for conferences and certifications

• 16 weeks paid parental leave for primary caregivers

• Mental health support including therapy coverage and wellness programs

• $15,000 relocation assistance for Bay Area moves

Work Environment & Perks

• Hybrid schedule: 3 days in office, 2 days remote with flexible hours

• Top-tier hardware: MacBook Pro M3 Max plus $2,000 home office allowance

• Access to cutting-edge GPU clusters for personal research projects

• On-site gourmet meals and snacks at San Francisco headquarters

• Annual company retreats and regular team building activities

• Opportunity to publish research and present at conferences with full sponsorship

• Mentorship programs connecting you with industry leaders

• Sabbatical opportunities after 4 years of service

Our Culture

We foster a collaborative environment where experimentation and knowledge sharing thrive. Weekly tech talks, cross-functional pod structures, and a commitment to continuous learning create an atmosphere where innovation flourishes. Team members from leading tech companies and top universities work together to solve complex challenges in AI and finance.

Location & Work Arrangement

San Francisco, CA headquarters with a hybrid work model. Core collaboration hours are 10 AM - 3 PM Pacific Time to accommodate our global teams in London, Tokyo, and Berlin. Occasional international travel opportunities to collaborate with our worldwide offices.

Ready to Shape the Future of AI in FinTech?

Join TechStart and be part of a team that's revolutionizing financial services through artificial intelligence. We're committed to building diverse, inclusive teams and encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds.

Apply today and help us build the next generation of AI-powered financial solutions that impact millions of users worldwide.

TechStart is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a diverse and inclusive team. We provide reasonable accommodations to qualified individuals with disabilities.

candidates.summary: Neethu is a passionate Data Scientist dedicated to unravelling the narratives hidden within data. With a Master's degree in Data Science from Lancaster University and proficiency in Python, SQL, and machine learning, she excels at merging data insights with strategic business goals. Throughout her career, Neethu has orchestrated complex data strategies, led stakeholder engagements, and developed automated dashboards to drive informed decisions. Her expertise spans regression, classification, clustering, and more, enabling her to uncover actionable patterns and trends that propel organisational success. Beyond her professional pursuits, she finds inspiration in music and art—singing and drawing serve as her creative outlets. In all her endeavours, whether crafting predictive models or creating art, she brings creativity, curiosity, and a commitment to excellence.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: At Career Connect, I focus on analyzing data to develop predictive models that assess the risk of young individuals becoming NEET (Not in Education, Employment, or Training). By examining historical trends and key factors such as demographics, education, and socio-economic conditions, I identify patterns that inform early intervention strategies to reduce NEET rates and promote youth engagement. My role involves collaborating with teams to collect and refine data, ensuring that analyses are accurate and actionable. The insights I generate support evidence-based policy-making and program design. Additionally, I streamline reporting processes, build dashboards, and provide strategic insights to advance Career Connect's mission. Through data-driven analytics, I aim to enhance educational, employment, and training outcomes, helping young people achieve long-term success.
achievements: Developed predictive models for NEET risk assessment

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: I've played a pivotal role in revolutionising healthcare services through data-driven insights and innovative solutions. From aggregating and structuring complex datasets to developing predictive models for attendance forecasting, my journey as a Data Science Intern at LCC has been marked by a relentless pursuit of efficiency and excellence. Leveraging advanced analytics tools like Python and Power BI, I've unearthed actionable insights that have not only optimised NHS health check services but also empowered decision-makers with invaluable information. My collaborative spirit and effective communication have fostered a dynamic team environment, where sharing insights and ideas is paramount to success. My passion for making a tangible impact in healthcare, combined with a diverse skill set encompassing data analysis, predictive modelling, and visualisation, continues to drive me towards shaping a brighter future for healthcare delivery.
achievements: Developed predictive models for attendance forecasting
Aggregated and structured complex healthcare datasets

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: My role at Evoke Frames encompasses a diverse array of responsibilities crucial to the company's growth and client acquisition. Key highlights include building strong client relationships, developing sales and marketing strategies, identifying and mitigating business risks, and utilising data insights for informed decision-making. By leveraging tools like Google Analytics and Meta Business Suite, I've spearheaded web analysis and implemented SEO-focused content strategies, resulting in significant reductions in bounce rates and notable sales increases. My multifaceted contributions at the intersection of client relations, data analysis, and strategic decision-making have been instrumental in elevating Evoke Frame's market presence and driving substantial growth.
